item.title: FSR
item.description: score:960 Chances: Fisker Inc. announced a new line of vehicles, including a pickup truck, targeting a popular segment in the U.S. market. The Fisker Alaska pickup truck, priced at $45,400 before incentives, is expected to capitalize on demand for affordable electric trucks. The company’s decision to manufacture cars in the U.
